vendor_name: Coco B Isla - Luxury Villa Collection
title: Mexico Island Luxury with Half-Day Snorkelling Tour
description:
Indulge in the ultimate island escape to Mexico's exclusive Casa Coco by Coco B Isla, a secluded sanctuary on the postcard-perfect Caribbean Sea. This stunning boutique property is located on Isla Mujeres, a 20-minute ferry from Cancún, and has featured in Condé Nast Traveler and Travelmyth's Honeymoon Hotels Collection.

Experience the pure relaxation of a fuss-free escape with daily breakfast, a local speciality welcome gift on arrival and return airport transfers (taxi and ferry) from Cancún International Airport. Your stay also includes a complimentary half-day snorkelling tour of Isla Mujeres' striking underwater world - crystal-clear waters and dazzling sands, home to mesmerising marine life and filled with undersea marvels.
